description:
Load up with confidence, these quality poles keep you balanced in rough terrain. Cork grips are a luxurious detail, and the wrist strap is shaped for all-day comfort. The twist-lock is reinforced with an internal steel mechanism for durability and longevity.

  • 7075-T6 aluminum construction is light, durable and economical
  • Fits in backpacks or luggage, adjusts from 105-140cm
  • Durable twist-lock mechanism is easy to loosen or tighten
  • Comfortable cork grips with shaped, ergonomic webbing loops
  • Mid-sized trekking basket reduces snagging, with a carbide tip
name: MEC Ridgelink Trekking Poles - Unisex
